name: Vintage SPACE Restaurant with AI
description:
Hello this is Vivy & DGSpitzer,

we are a small team of two~

All the game design, art and music are created in 72 hours!!!

hope you enjoy it!

The meta era starts when the spaceship becomes human habitation. You are the AI keeper working at nostalgia fast food on the “You Can Get All No. 757” spaceship. The unstable machines means the restaurant is in a dangerous state.. That every piece of you and your restaurant will be broken down to resources for the new high tech. To survive, you have to do something. Keep the equipment working stable and satisfy the customers.

Your goal is to feed the astronauts before they become angry. You will lose a heart if they leave without eating.

The machine is supposed to do the job automatically, but they are old and work very unstable, so you have to help them. You have to deliver food while fixing them, and mopping up the floor.

Machines at good state vs bad state

Try to keep everything working!

【HOW TO PLAY】

[WASD / Arrow Keys] - Control the AI

[SPACE] - Fix machine, grab food, deliver food

随着星际飞船成为人类栖息地后，宇宙元年正式开始。 你是“百货”星际飞船上“怀旧快餐”店的AI管家。 不稳定工作的机器预示着这家餐厅将要被分解回收…供给最新的科技产品。 为了能够活下来，你决定努力自救。 保证所有设施都正常运作，让顾客满意而归。
